description.ruby-sapphire:
Destroys barriers such as
REFLECT and causes damage.
description.emerald:
Destroys barriers such as
REFLECT and causes damage.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that also
breaks any barrier
like LIGHT SCREEN
and REFLECT.
description.diamond-pearl:

tough fists, etc. It
can also break any
barrier such as Light
Screen and Reflect.

effect.full: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target's side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
